<h2>Changes</h2>

<p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/310742115-bedae1db-c12e-498c-92f0-d29033ed688d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qiVymd6TGTPdodCSoyTFSyg0p8Kyb7iRiJ1J-Dz6xno"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/310742115-bedae1db-c12e-498c-92f0-d29033ed688d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qiVymd6TGTPdodCSoyTFSyg0p8Kyb7iRiJ1J-Dz6xno" alt="qfield32" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>

<h3>ðŸš€ Features</h3>
<ul>
<li>Project-defined tracking sessions activated on project load</li>
<li>Background push and synchronization for cloud projects</li>
<li>Automatically push pending changes to the cloud on a regular interval</li>
<li>New undo/redo functionality allowing you to reverse undesired digitizing and feature editing</li>
<li>Title and copyright decoration overlay on top of the map canvas</li>
</ul>
<h3>âœ¨ Improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>Better progress feedback when  downloading and synchronizing cloud projects</li>
<li>Visual indicators of â€˜newerâ€™ cloud project available on the server in QField</li>
<li>Relationshipâ€™s children can now be created <em>prior to</em> saving their parent feature</li>
<li>Insure positioning precise view (i.e. stake-out) works on compass-less devices</li>
<li>User interface polishing, including a brand new main menu layout</li>
<li>Support for gpsd-served NMEA streams over TCP/UDP</li>
<li>Updated several underlying libraries, including QGIS (v3.36) and Qt (v6.6.2)</li>
</ul>

<h3>ðŸ¤– Android improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>Massive re-work of native camera, gallery, and file opening activities unlocking proper OS activity overlay</li>
</ul>
